title: ЛАПТОП ASUS TUF GAMING F15 FX507ZU4-LP056 I7-12700H/16GB/1TB/RTX 4050 6GB
description:

Резолуција:(1920 x 1080) FHD IPS 144Hz
Процесор:12th Gen Intel Core i7-12700H Processor 2.3 GHz (24M Cache, up to 4.7 GHz, 14 cores:)
